LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: I opened the door, and what I found on the other side was――

LABEL: 0x414
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun!」

LABEL: 0x43F
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x460
STRING: Those two facing each other.

LABEL: 0x48A
STRING: 「Yukari-san――」

LABEL: 0x4A6
STRING: So... she was alive.

LABEL: 0x4C6
STRING: We had left her in that small room in the rear section filled with that light...

LABEL: 0x506
STRING: Tokiwa had said she was still alive, but on the inside, I had assumed the worst.

LABEL: 0x560
STRING: Seeing Yukari again made me feel relieved.

LABEL: 0x650
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x66A
STRING: The atmosphere in the room was definitely not peaceful.

LABEL: 0x696
STRING: Between the two was a speargun――

LABEL: 0x6C6
STRING: Yukari was pointing its silver arrowhead at Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x6F6
STRING: 「What... are you two doing?」

LABEL: 0x790
STRING: 「Stay back!」

LABEL: 0x816
STRING: 「Don't come closer!」

LABEL: 0x849
STRING: 「She's――」

LABEL: 0x867
STRING: 「She's trying to kill her!」

LABEL: 0x89C
STRING: Hiragino shouted frantically.

LABEL: 0x8BA
STRING: Was he trying to protect Touri somehow...?

LABEL: 0x8E8
STRING: He desperately tried to convey Yukari's intentions to us.

LABEL: 0x95C
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x974
STRING: 「Yukari-san――」

LABEL: 0x992
STRING: ...It was already too late.

LABEL: 0xA9B
STRING: 「Stay away from me!」

LABEL: 0xAC3
STRING: 「If you come any closer, I'll shoot you as well――」

LABEL: 0xB08
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0xB25
STRING: In the end, it was Tokiwa who faced her.

LABEL: 0xB59
STRING: She approached Yukari, her tone quiet yet full of determination.

LABEL: 0xC62
STRING: 「Yukari-san, please throw that speargun away.」

LABEL: 0xC98
STRING: 「That's the best course of action.」

LABEL: 0xD47
STRING: Tokiwa tried to persuade her without fear.

LABEL: 0xD77
STRING: She was full of confidence.

LABEL: 0xDA1
STRING: She was confident that she was making the best choice.

LABEL: 0xDD9
STRING: Confident that we could reach the best possible outcome.

LABEL: 0xE0D
STRING: Seeing her expression――

LABEL: 0xE2B
STRING: Yukari's face twitched sadly.

LABEL: 0xE66
STRING: 「...I'm sorry, Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0xF29
STRING: 「――But the one who's right is me.」

LABEL: 0xF58
STRING: 「Yukari-san!」

LABEL: 0xF72
STRING: Why――

LABEL: 0xF8A
STRING: Why wouldn't she listen?

LABEL: 0xFB6
STRING: It was wrong for us to antagonize each other like this, no matter how little time we had.

LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: 「Please... just drop that thing you're holding.」

LABEL: 0x104C
STRING: 「We might still make it!」

LABEL: 0x1095
STRING: 「He's right.」

LABEL: 0x10B3
STRING: 「I haven't confirmed it yet, but...」

LABEL: 0x10E7
STRING: 「In my opinion, it's possible for all of us here to escape to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x114E
STRING: 「That's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x116D
STRING: Yukari denied it immediately.

LABEL: 0x1191
STRING: She didn't even try to listen to us.

LABEL: 0x11DE
STRING: 「That's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x120F
STRING: 「How can you be so sure?」

LABEL: 0x12A9
STRING: 「You're...」

LABEL: 0x12CA
STRING: 「If you say something is impossible and give up before you know for sure, then nothing is possible.」

LABEL: 0x135E
STRING: 「I know you're trying to do whatever is best for us.」

LABEL: 0x13A8
STRING: ――It must be because of her sense of duty.

LABEL: 0x13D6
STRING: To achieve the greatest happiness for the largest number of people.

LABEL: 0x13F8
STRING: There was no doubt that Yukari's actions were all for that purpose.

LABEL: 0x146C
STRING: That's right, she had killed Touri.

LABEL: 0x1496
STRING: There was no way she had actually wanted to kill a girl she was so close to.

LABEL: 0x14D8
STRING: She must be trying to help by pointing her gun at us right now as well.

LABEL: 0x1542
STRING: Wasn't that right?

LABEL: 0x1560
STRING: I mean... look, the tip of the speargun in Yukari's hands...

LABEL: 0x159E
STRING: Unlike before, it was trembling.

LABEL: 0x1697
STRING: 「You hear that... Momoi?」

LABEL: 0x16B7
STRING: 「These two have an idea.」

LABEL: 0x16EB
STRING: 「Just put the gun down.」

LABEL: 0x1795
STRING: 「...Tell me about this idea of yours.」

LABEL: 0x17CF
STRING: 「We'll talk after that.」

LABEL: 0x17F6
STRING: Thanks to Hiragino's persuasion, Yukari listened to us.

LABEL: 0x182E
STRING: However, the tip of her speargun was still pointed at Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x1899
STRING: 「Now, talk.」

LABEL: 0x191A
STRING: 「...Hurry!」

LABEL: 0x193B
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x198D
STRING: And so, I gave her the conclusion we had reached with Tokiwa earlier.

LABEL: 0x19D1
STRING: In other words, the idea of using the rescue ship to escape――

LABEL: 0x1ADA
STRING: 「Is that all?」

LABEL: 0x1B01
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x1B19
STRING: 「But it's worth a try.」

LABEL: 0x1BAB
STRING: 「――It's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x1BCB
STRING: 「I told you we can't use the rescue ship, didn't I?」

LABEL: 0x1C0C
STRING: She sounded astonished.

LABEL: 0x1C2E
STRING: Like she was correcting a short-sighted student of hers.

LABEL: 0x1C5C
STRING: But, it wasn't as if we'd proposed what we did without thinking.

LABEL: 0x1CB2
STRING: 「Yeah, you're right. You can't pilot the ship normally in its current state.」

LABEL: 0x1D0A
STRING: 「But we're saying we don't have to pilot it in the first place――」

LABEL: 0x1DD0
STRING: 「――"In its current state?"」

LABEL: 0x1DF4
STRING: 「You sound like you've seen it yourself.」

LABEL: 0x1E2D
STRING: 「I have...」

LABEL: 0x1E47
STRING: I didn't deny it.

LABEL: 0x1E63
STRING: I felt sorry for not following her orders... but I knew because I saw it with my own eyes.

LABEL: 0x1EBB
STRING: That there existed a chance for us to escape.

LABEL: 0x1F25
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x1FA9
STRING: 「D-Don't tell me――」

LABEL: 0x1FC9
STRING: 「You went inside the rescue ship?!」

LABEL: 0x2005
STRING: 「I told you not to enter!!」

LABEL: 0x2032
STRING: Yukari's demeanor suddenly changed.

LABEL: 0x204C
STRING: Instantly, her already white face turned even paler as she opened her eyes wide and screamed at us.

LABEL: 0x2094
STRING: Tokiwa trembled beside me.

LABEL: 0x20BE
STRING: Hiragino also stiffened as if frightened by Yukari's distraught state.

LABEL: 0x20FA
STRING: Her anger was so sudden that I didn't know what to do.

LABEL: 0x2148
STRING: Why was she so angry――?

LABEL: 0x217C
STRING: 「I-I'm sorry. I apologize for ignoring your orders, but――」

LABEL: 0x2224
STRING: 「Orders?!」

LABEL: 0x2246
STRING: 「Far from it...」

LABEL: 0x2268
STRING: 「That wasn't an order. It was a "warning."」

LABEL: 0x22A1
STRING: Not an order, but a warning――

LABEL: 0x22C5
STRING: Her serious tone made me even more perplexed.

LABEL: 0x2300
STRING: 「Why do you think I sealed off that ship?」

LABEL: 0x236C
STRING: 「I was trying to save you.」

LABEL: 0x239F
STRING: Save us?

LABEL: 0x23C1
STRING: That was why she had sealed off the rescue ship?

LABEL: 0x23E9
STRING: I didn't get it.

LABEL: 0x2409
STRING: She blocked off our only remaining path to escape――

LABEL: 0x24AB
STRING: ――No, that wasn't it.

LABEL: 0x24C9
STRING: The premise was different.

LABEL: 0x24E7
STRING: She was forcibly denying the answer me and Tokiwa had reached with the information we had available.

LABEL: 0x2541
STRING: What the hell did she know that we didn't...?

LABEL: 0x263A
STRING: 「It might be too late already...」

LABEL: 0x2668
STRING: 「...But, if you're not injured, there's still a chance.」

LABEL: 0x26AF
STRING: Yukari's inner thoughts leaked out as if she were talking to herself.

LABEL: 0x26E5
STRING: Before long, she pointed the speargun at us.

LABEL: 0x2793
STRING: 「Please!」

LABEL: 0x27B1
STRING: 「Get away from here right now!」

LABEL: 0x286C
STRING: 「Go, or I'll shoot!」

LABEL: 0x288F
STRING: ...The tip of her speargun was shaking as she ordered us.

LABEL: 0x28C5
STRING: It was obvious that she was forcing herself.

LABEL: 0x28EF
STRING: Seeing Yukari like that, unable to lower the speargun, was tragic.

LABEL: 0x293D
STRING: 「――What are you going to do if we leave?」

LABEL: 0x29D9
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x29FA
STRING: She stammered.

LABEL: 0x2A14
STRING: After Tokiwa and I left the room, what was she planning on doing...?

LABEL: 0x2B2D
STRING: 「...She means to shoot me and her with that gun, right?」

LABEL: 0x2BAC
STRING: What was Hiragino talking about...?

LABEL: 0x2BD6
STRING: And why wasn't Yukari denying it?

LABEL: 0x2C00
STRING: She only averted her eyes while staying silent.

LABEL: 0x2C30
STRING: Seeing that, Hiragino sighed deeply.

LABEL: 0x2CCE
STRING: 「――Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x2D20
STRING: 「I have an inkling.」

LABEL: 0x2D46
STRING: 「――After all, I am a doctor.」

LABEL: 0x2D6A
STRING: 「It's not that I didn't think this day would come eventually.」

LABEL: 0x2DB5
STRING: Hiragino was not questioning Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2DEB
STRING: He spoke quietly in self-reflection.

LABEL: 0x2E1D
STRING: ――His eyes looked terribly sad.

LABEL: 0x2EE0
STRING: Seeing those eyes,

LABEL: 0x2EFC
STRING: I suddenly recalled the conversation I had with him.

LABEL: 0x2FFB
STRING: 「Why did you decide to become a doctor, Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x30B2
STRING: 「The reason I became a doctor...」

LABEL: 0x30DC
STRING: 「It's been a while since anyone's asked me that.」

LABEL: 0x3174
STRING: 「...Have you ever read Camus?」

LABEL: 0x3226
STRING: ――He wasn't talking about "The Stranger."

LABEL: 0x324C
STRING: Camus' novels...

LABEL: 0x326A
STRING: What Hiragino was referring to was――

LABEL: 0x32A1
STRING: 「We're "infected," aren't we?」

LABEL: 0x32D6
STRING: ――"The Plague."

LABEL: 0x32F6
STRING: It was novel by Albert Camus, featuring a doctor.

LABEL: 0x3332
STRING: A tragic story of a doctor named Rieux,

LABEL: 0x3364
STRING: who helplessly watched people die in an epidemic-infested Algerian town,

LABEL: 0x339E
STRING: and eventually accepted the absurdity of his merciless fate.

LABEL: 0x33E6
STRING: Doctor――Hiragino――Epidemic――Infection――

LABEL: 0x3416
STRING: There was a connection.

LABEL: 0x34D5
STRING: Tokiwa and I couldn't say a thing.

LABEL: 0x3503
STRING: "Infection."

LABEL: 0x3519
STRING: That word flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x3549
STRING: What did he mean by "infected?"

LABEL: 0x356D
STRING: When, who, and what did we get infected with?

LABEL: 0x3662
STRING: 「...Is it <Alice>?」

LABEL: 0x36F2
STRING: 「No, that's not it.」

LABEL: 0x3717
STRING: ――<Alice>.

LABEL: 0x3735
STRING: Was <Alice> a cryptic term referring to some specific infectious disease?

LABEL: 0x3771
STRING: However, Yukari shook her head from side to side.

LABEL: 0x37B4
STRING: 「It's something even more terrifying.」

LABEL: 0x37EB
STRING: 「Terrifying...?」

LABEL: 0x3877
STRING: 「...It's something that must never be brought to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x38B3
STRING: 「ROMLES has done everything in its power to guard "it"...」

LABEL: 0x38F9
STRING: 「This ship is not Noah's Ark anymore.」

LABEL: 0x392F
STRING: 「It's something that must never be opened...」

LABEL: 0x3995
STRING: 「――A Pandora's box.」

LABEL: 0x39C4
STRING: ――Infection.

LABEL: 0x3A96
STRING: One possibility came to my mind.

LABEL: 0x3AC0
STRING: No... I could only think of one possibility.

LABEL: 0x3AF0
STRING: ――The man who had been attacked by that light and had collapsed.

LABEL: 0x3B18
STRING: ――And Reiri, who had suffered a similar fate.

LABEL: 0x3C6A
STRING: 「How did you get that injury?」

LABEL: 0x3CA5
STRING: 「I already told you, I tripped――」

LABEL: 0x3CD2
STRING: ――Hiragino had scraped his elbow trying to save me and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3E0F
STRING: ――Touri was stung by that creature.

LABEL: 0x3F06
STRING: 「――Someone slashed me from behind.」

LABEL: 0x3F45
STRING: ――Yukari was bleeding from her shoulder.

LABEL: 0x3F6F
STRING: They had all been injured while being near that "light."

LABEL: 0x4020
STRING: 「Are either of you... hurt?」

LABEL: 0x40D6
STRING: Everyone except Tokiwa and me...

LABEL: 0x4114
STRING: I see.

LABEL: 0x412A
STRING: So that's how it was.

LABEL: 0x414C
STRING: I was standing stock-still at the entrance to the room.

LABEL: 0x4174
STRING: At that moment, I realized the truth.

LABEL: 0x4249
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x4265
STRING: ――She was trying to save us, just as she said.

LABEL: 0x42A7
STRING: If the "infection" Yukari was talking about

LABEL: 0x42E3
STRING: spread through open wounds,

LABEL: 0x4317
STRING: then the only ones on this ship who were uninjured

LABEL: 0x4337
STRING: were Tokiwa and me.

LABEL: 0x436D
STRING: That was the reason why Yukari was threatening us with the speargun.

LABEL: 0x43AD
STRING: That was why she was making sure we didn't step into this room.

LABEL: 0x445B
STRING: 「Stay away!」

LABEL: 0x4486
STRING: ――It was all in order to keep the "possibly infected" and the "uninfected" separated.

LABEL: 0x452E
STRING: It was all for our sake.

LABEL: 0x455A
STRING: She knew about the "infection"

LABEL: 0x458E
STRING: and had given up on all of us escaping from here together.

LABEL: 0x45C0
STRING: Hiragino and Touri were wounded. She herself had been cut in the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x460A
STRING: Yukari knew none of them could return to the surface anymore

LABEL: 0x4652
STRING: and was doing her best to ensure that those who could, would.

LABEL: 0x46A2
STRING: ―――If that was the case, then that was the reason why she had shot Touri with the speargun as well.

LABEL: 0x46E6
STRING: That was to say...

LABEL: 0x4704
STRING: To protect us from her infection.

LABEL: 0x4754
STRING: 「Did she die for our sake...?」

LABEL: 0x485B
STRING: 「Touri-kun――」

LABEL: 0x487B
STRING: 「Don't tell me... Momoi...!」

LABEL: 0x492A
STRING: Hiragino called her name in a hopeless tone.

LABEL: 0x4956
STRING: The death of the girl whom he had cherished and tried to protect.

LABEL: 0x4986
STRING: It was his precious colleague who had taken her life.

LABEL: 0x49B4
STRING: His despair must be... immeasurable.

LABEL: 0x4A16
STRING: The tension left his shoulders, and he staggered helplessly.

LABEL: 0x4A4E
STRING: Yukari opened her mouth as he saw him like that.

LABEL: 0x4AEC
STRING: 「That's right...」

LABEL: 0x4B0A
STRING: 「――It's my duty to bring as many people back alive as possible.」

LABEL: 0x4BAB
STRING: 「And besides――」

LABEL: 0x4BC7
STRING: 「I didn't want to make her suffer anymore.」

LABEL: 0x4C08
STRING: That was Yukari's way of showing kindness.

LABEL: 0x4C3D
STRING: 「Even if the rescue team did come...」

LABEL: 0x4C67
STRING: 「Even if we could get back to the surface...」

LABEL: 0x4C93
STRING: 「She would never see the light of day as long as she was infected with that thing.」

LABEL: 0x4CD9
STRING: 「Sooner or later, she was guaranteed to die.」

LABEL: 0x4D46
STRING: 「...So, that's why you killed her.」

LABEL: 0x4D79
STRING: Hiragino's tone of voice demanded an answer.

LABEL: 0x4D9B
STRING: It was already far from angry.

LABEL: 0x4DBF
STRING: Yukari nodded and hung her head.

LABEL: 0x4E51
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x4E67
STRING: 「...It's as you say.」

LABEL: 0x4EE8
STRING: 「That's my mission and the only thing I can do.」

LABEL: 0x4FF5
STRING: 「Momoi...」

LABEL: 0x500F
STRING: 「You're wrong.」

LABEL: 0x5035
STRING: 「Even if she was infected with a lethal virus...」

LABEL: 0x507B
STRING: 「You didn't have to kill her.」

LABEL: 0x50BB
STRING: 「Maybe she could've lasted until we got out of here.」

LABEL: 0x5101
STRING: 「There might've been something we could've done to help her.」

LABEL: 0x5140
STRING: After a moment of silence, Hiragino raised his voice as if mustering all his strength.

LABEL: 0x517E
STRING: Even so, there was no power behind his voice.

LABEL: 0x51A6
STRING: Only sadness.

LABEL: 0x51E5
STRING: 「――It's the same for me and you.」

LABEL: 0x5215
STRING: 「As long as you're alive, there are possibilities.」

LABEL: 0x5241
STRING: 「Why do you give up on living so easily...?」

LABEL: 0x529E
STRING: 「"A lethal virus"...」

LABEL: 0x532B
STRING: 「Those aren't the words I'd use.」

LABEL: 0x53A1
STRING: 「That thing is so much more than that.」

LABEL: 0x53D6
STRING: Even Hiragino's words couldn't reach Yukari.

LABEL: 0x5472
STRING: 「...You have to understand something.」

LABEL: 0x5498
STRING: 「My greatest mission was not to escape from this ship.」

LABEL: 0x54DE
STRING: 「It was to keep that light from reaching the surface.」

LABEL: 0x550E
STRING: 「It's my duty to protect the passengers to the best of my ability, on the condition that they're not subjected to that light.」

LABEL: 0x55C7
STRING: 「I'm the chief attendant of the <SHEEP III>, but more than that, I'm a member of ROMLES!」

LABEL: 0x5623
STRING: 「What the hell are you talking about...?」

LABEL: 0x5651
STRING: Why...? I didn't understand...

LABEL: 0x5677
STRING: Why was there a contradiction between being the chief attendant of this ship and being a member of ROMLES?

LABEL: 0x56DC
STRING: They were both part of the same organization, so why were their interests so mismatched?

LABEL: 0x57AE
STRING: 「Have you heard of this problem?」

LABEL: 0x57D8
STRING: 「Five workers were left on the tracks in front of a fast-moving trolley.」

LABEL: 0x583B
STRING: 「If nothing was done, five people would be run over――」

LABEL: 0x5874
STRING: 「At that time, you happened to be right next to the railroad switch.」

LABEL: 0x58B6
STRING: 「If you switched the course of the trolley, those five would definitely be saved.」

LABEL: 0x5905
STRING: 「But, there was another worker left alone on the other track.」

LABEL: 0x5960
STRING: 「So, would you flip that switch and change the course of the trolley?」

LABEL: 0x59D1
STRING: I was at a loss for an answer.

LABEL: 0x59F5
STRING: If I didn't switch, five people would die.

LABEL: 0x5A20
STRING: If I switched, I could save five people but end up killing one.

LABEL: 0x5A76
STRING: Looking at the results alone, the latter seemed to be the right answer.

LABEL: 0x5AC0
STRING: However, wasn't producing new deaths the same as selecting who lived?

LABEL: 0x5B14
STRING: I didn't know if such a right should be entrusted to me, who just happened to be standing there――

LABEL: 0x5C35
STRING: 「"Trolley problem."」

LABEL: 0x5C56
STRING: 「As people call it. 」

LABEL: 0x5CC4
STRING: 「It's a problem with no right answer... One way or another, there will be victims.」

LABEL: 0x5D12
STRING: 「We lack the prerequisite to answer the question.」

LABEL: 0x5D5B
STRING: 「Is that so?」

LABEL: 0x5DE9
STRING: 「Hoh?」

LABEL: 0x5E06
STRING: Tokiwa looked like she was caught off guard.

LABEL: 0x5E2E
STRING: Yukari turned toward us with a resolute expression.

LABEL: 0x5E77
STRING: 「I think switching the track is the right choice.」

LABEL: 0x5EAB
STRING: 「If that will save the most people, then that's my choice...」

LABEL: 0x5F20
STRING: ――Even if it meant dirtying her own hands.

LABEL: 0x5F57
STRING: 「That's what it comes down to.」

LABEL: 0x5F8A
STRING: Was she saying that she had no choice but to kill Touri in order to protect me and Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x5FF2
STRING: That was wrong.

LABEL: 0x6006
STRING: The most... people...

LABEL: 0x6022
STRING: Was I still misunderstanding her?

LABEL: 0x6052
STRING: Yukari wasn't just trying to protect the two of us.

LABEL: 0x6096
STRING: Rather, what she was looking at was much bigger――

LABEL: 0x6133
STRING: 「...So that's how it is.」

LABEL: 0x6155
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x6171
STRING: 「――You were the saboteur.」

LABEL: 0x619F
STRING: She closed her eyes for a moment. Once she opened them again, they radiated a strong will.

LABEL: 0x61F4
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x6213
STRING: She admitted it in a matter-of-fact tone.

LABEL: 0x6245
STRING: 「The one who destroyed the communication equipment and cut off the transmission...」

LABEL: 0x62FA
STRING: ――Was Yukari.

LABEL: 0x631A
STRING: I recalled our conversation in the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x6413
STRING: Yukari had noticed the broken communication equipment from a distance at a glance.

LABEL: 0x6453
STRING: In that pitch-dark room, even I hadn't noticed it until I got up close.

LABEL: 0x64B1
STRING: There was no way she should have seen it from that far...

LABEL: 0x64EF
STRING: No.

LABEL: 0x6503
STRING: Now that I thought about it, there was something even stranger.

LABEL: 0x65B0
STRING: ――The timing of the equipment being destroyed.

LABEL: 0x65E2
STRING: At the time, I came to the conclusion that the culprit could not be identified... but I had forgotten an important premise.

LABEL: 0x66B1
STRING: The only key that could unlock the wheelhouse―Yukari's key card―was in my hands.

LABEL: 0x6709
STRING: Because I had secretly exchanged them while she was asleep.

LABEL: 0x673F
STRING: So, the keycard that Yukari said she had lost was my forged one.

LABEL: 0x678F
STRING: In other words, whether she was telling the truth about losing the key or not――

LABEL: 0x67D5
STRING: No one had been able to enter that room since the blackout ended.

LABEL: 0x6819
STRING: Which meant that the communication equipment had been destroyed during the blackout.

LABEL: 0x68BC
STRING: But if that was the truth...

LABEL: 0x68DE
STRING: Why did they need to go out of their way to destroy communication equipment during the blackout?

LABEL: 0x6924
STRING: It was something that couldn't be used until electricity was back either way. There should have been no problem with leaving it alone.

LABEL: 0x6980
STRING: And yet, why did they have to go to all that trouble to destroy the equipment there in the dark?

LABEL: 0x69DC
STRING: There was only one reason.

LABEL: 0x6A66
STRING: They knew.

LABEL: 0x6A90
STRING: The fact that in a few hours... the power would be restored.

LABEL: 0x6B3C
STRING: There were only two people who fit that bill.

LABEL: 0x6B6E
STRING: Tokiwa did not have the key to operate the elevator, so she could not leave the power room until the power was restored.

LABEL: 0x6BE0
STRING: So, the only one left was...

LABEL: 0x6C7A
STRING: 「What?!」

LABEL: 0x6C98
STRING: 「We managed to make contact once!」

LABEL: 0x6CC4
STRING: 「If the equipment was still functional, there was a chance that we could re-establish the connection... So why?」

LABEL: 0x6D8B
STRING: 「"Managed to make contact"...」

LABEL: 0x6E1A
STRING: 「It was because the transmission "connected."」

LABEL: 0x6EDD
STRING: 「Once the power was restored, everyone would attempt to resume communications.」

LABEL: 0x6F2F
STRING: 「But even so, if the transmission was connected again...」

LABEL: 0x6F6B
STRING: 「Even if the rescue team came, they would be under the threat of the "light" too.」

LABEL: 0x6FBD
STRING: 「――In fact, that man was attacked by it.」

LABEL: 0x6FF7
STRING: 「It must be because he didn't think that "light" had invaded this ship.」

LABEL: 0x7056
STRING: The man who had died, enveloped in light.

LABEL: 0x707A
STRING: The image of his hideous corpse passed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x7116
STRING: 「――No, even if the rescuers were able to bring us safely back to the surface...」

LABEL: 0x7162
STRING: 「It's much more serious than that.」

LABEL: 0x7194
STRING: 「――Because Hiragino-sensei and Touri-san would be going outside.」

LABEL: 0x7279
STRING: 「I can't allow that.」

LABEL: 0x7299
STRING: 「No matter what, we mustn't let that "light" reach the surface.」

LABEL: 0x72E4
STRING: Even if the rescue team came, we couldn't leave...

LABEL: 0x7310
STRING: If we were to be rescued, the threat of that "light" would spread to the surface.

LABEL: 0x735A
STRING: All Yukari had done was to prevent that from happening――

LABEL: 0x739C
STRING: 「――Why did you destroy the rescue ship?」

LABEL: 0x73CC
STRING: 「Never mind me, you could have left a way for Tokiwa to escape. She isn't infected!」

LABEL: 0x749C
STRING: 「...Because of Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x74C0
STRING: 「Touri-san put her inside that ship.」

LABEL: 0x7500
STRING: 「Her body was bleeding from all over...」

LABEL: 0x7550
STRING: 「Bleeding blood that was infected by that abominable light...」

LABEL: 0x7588
STRING: 「――In other words, the rescue ship was contaminated by it.」

LABEL: 0x7657
STRING: 「That's why I can't let that ship return to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x769C
STRING: We couldn't use the rescue ship...

LABEL: 0x76BE
STRING: That ship must not return to the surface.

LABEL: 0x76EC
STRING: It was a merciless answer.

LABEL: 0x7706
STRING: However, there was something shining in Yukari's eyes as she told us that.

LABEL: 0x77B8
STRING: 「I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x77D6
STRING: 「I would've saved you if I could.」

LABEL: 0x781F
STRING: ――A dark light dwelled in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x7858
STRING: 「For us here...」

LABEL: 0x789A
STRING: 「――There's no choice but to sink.」

LABEL: 0x78C7
STRING: I was overwhelmed by her earnestness.

LABEL: 0x78ED
STRING: What was she saying with those honest eyes...?

LABEL: 0x793E
STRING: 「Momoi...」

LABEL: 0x7958
STRING: 「How can you be so stubborn... and just give up?」

LABEL: 0x79B0
STRING: 「What have we been infected with?」

LABEL: 0x79F1
STRING: Hiragino's voice trembled.

LABEL: 0x7A11
STRING: Yukari had completely given up on returning to the surface alive.

LABEL: 0x7A57
STRING: What the hell had we been infected with――

LABEL: 0x7B35
STRING: 「――Sensei...」

LABEL: 0x7B51
STRING: 「<COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x7B6B
STRING: 「Have you heard of it?」

LABEL: 0x7BA8
STRING: ――<COOS>.

LABEL: 0x7BCE
STRING: Was it an English word?

LABEL: 0x7BFC
STRING: Or some kind of medical jargon?

LABEL: 0x7C2E
STRING: Hiragino, a doctor, shook his head in silence as well.

LABEL: 0x7CCA
STRING: 「I thought so... It's the most confidential information ROMLES has.」

LABEL: 0x7D40
STRING: 「Since there's no hope of us being saved, let's talk.」

LABEL: 0x7D81
STRING: Something to take with us to the grave, huh?

LABEL: 0x7DA9
STRING: Yukari raised her index finger and began her explanation, just as she had once told Touri about the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x7E1C
STRING: 「<COOS> is a kind of bacteria.」

LABEL: 0x7E4A
STRING: 「It emits an unknown spectrum of light that has yet to be analyzed.」

LABEL: 0x7E98
STRING: 「It infects all sorts of animals and alters their ecosystem...」

LABEL: 0x7EDB
STRING: 「Is that――」

LABEL: 0x7EF9
STRING: Yukari nodded.

LABEL: 0x7F38
STRING: 「Yes, that "light" is <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x7F77
STRING: Light――

LABEL: 0x7F8B
STRING: A strange crustacean that emitted never-before-seen colors...

LABEL: 0x7FCB
STRING: Was she saying that not the deep-sea creatures themselves, but the "light" they emitted, was its true identity...?

LABEL: 0x8093
STRING: 「Seven years ago――」

LABEL: 0x80AF
STRING: 「I saw the light of <COOS> for the first time.」

LABEL: 0x8188
STRING: 「That day, we... Me, your sister, and one other person...」

LABEL: 0x81D6
STRING: 「We all dove into these waters together as a part of a "project," you could say.」

LABEL: 0x822A
STRING: 「What I saw back then was that luminescence.」

LABEL: 0x8261
STRING: A research team formed of young people.

LABEL: 0x8289
STRING: A new model of a submarine.

LABEL: 0x82A5
STRING: What they encountered in the deep sea――

LABEL: 0x82CF
STRING: The thing that took my sister's life――

LABEL: 0x836E
STRING: 「――<COOS> propagates between living organisms.」

LABEL: 0x83A2
STRING: 「Other creatures may prey on the organisms infected by <COOS>, or...」

LABEL: 0x83E0
STRING: 「It can be transferred between organisms through the body fluids of a corpse.」

LABEL: 0x8440
STRING: 「Once <COOS> infects an organism, it migrates directly under the skin of its host.」

LABEL: 0x848C
STRING: 「It then attacks the host's DNA and begins to take over.」

LABEL: 0x84DE
STRING: 「Didn't you say <COOS> is a bacteria?」

LABEL: 0x851F
STRING: 「At the very least, it's not a virus... since it acts on its own.」

LABEL: 0x8569
STRING: 「But, like retroviruses, it has reverse transcriptase, which allows it to insert its own information into the host's DNA.」

LABEL: 0x85CA
STRING: 「<COOS> causes major mutations in the germ cells in particular.」

LABEL: 0x8612
STRING: 「It propagates not only horizontally but vertically as well―in other words, to the offspring.」

LABEL: 0x8668
STRING: 「It can spread across all living things.」

LABEL: 0x869C
STRING: 「And that's not all. Living beings controlled by <COOS> have their lifespans shortened.」

LABEL: 0x86F2
STRING: 「With each accelerated generation, strange changes occur in organisms infected by <COOS>―or rather, in the biological populations infected by it.」

LABEL: 0x875E
STRING: 「An enormous increase in size, mutations of bodily functions, and...」

LABEL: 0x879A
STRING: 「Through "light," the organisms are able to communicate with each other.」

LABEL: 0x87F8
STRING: 「It's better to consider them a new species at that point.」

LABEL: 0x8839
STRING: ――HeLa cells were isolated from humans.

LABEL: 0x8869
STRING: In terms of taxonomy, it was a new species, right...?

LABEL: 0x88AD
STRING: Differentiation of species occurred under human observation.

LABEL: 0x88DD
STRING: The same thing happened in a certain area, not in a single cell, but in a population of many organisms.

LABEL: 0x89AB
STRING: 「To put it simply, <COOS> is――」

LABEL: 0x89DF
STRING: 「A light that can "evolve" living things.」

LABEL: 0x8A10
STRING: ――Evolution.

LABEL: 0x8A28
STRING: I thought back to Hiragino's lecture.

LABEL: 0x8A54
STRING: It wasn't a change in individuals, but a change as a species that was inherited――

LABEL: 0x8B1E
STRING: 「<COOS> was first discovered in the 19th century in a farming village in the United Kingdom.」

LABEL: 0x8B7E
STRING: 「According to the records, it was like a scene from a nightmare.」

LABEL: 0x8BE0
STRING: 「There were bizarre growths in the plants and animals and their lifespans were shortened.」

LABEL: 0x8C1C
STRING: 「Rabbits and giant insects with unusual jumping power, plants and flowers that emitted mysterious colors...」

LABEL: 0x8C70
STRING: 「All the plants and animals in the vicinity had changed.」

LABEL: 0x8CA6
STRING: 「The patterns of those mutations varied from species to species, but there was always a common feature.」

LABEL: 0x8D00
STRING: 「――A strange luminescence.」

LABEL: 0x8D20
STRING: 「Light that didn't match any spectrum known at the time.」

LABEL: 0x8D66
STRING: 「The researchers called that light...」

LABEL: 0x8D9C
STRING: 「"The Colour Out Of Space"――<COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x8E05
STRING: 「And one day, without warning, the luminescence disappeared.」

LABEL: 0x8E47
STRING: 「We still don't know the cause.」

LABEL: 0x8E77
STRING: 「But here's what we're thinking... No, perhaps it's safe to say that we're certain...」

LABEL: 0x8EDB
STRING: 「It was probably due to the will of <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x8F23
STRING: 「Not a single blade of grass has grown on that piece of land since.」

LABEL: 0x8F65
STRING: 「To this day.」

LABEL: 0x8F8A
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x8FA6
STRING: 「It's been over a hundred years since...」

LABEL: 0x8FE6
STRING: 「Yes. The surrounding ecosystem was completely destroyed.」

LABEL: 0x9024
STRING: 「Crop circles, the Sea of Evil...」

LABEL: 0x905A
STRING: 「It's probably now the same as one of those baseless legends.」

LABEL: 0x9119
STRING: It was crazy to think that for over a hundred years, there had been no growth of plants or trees.

LABEL: 0x915F
STRING: Was that really possible?

LABEL: 0x918D
STRING: Wasn't that exactly what Yukari called baseless legends...?

LABEL: 0x91CF
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x92B2
STRING: 「――Listen to me.」

LABEL: 0x92D2
STRING: 「If <COOS> makes it to the surface...」

LABEL: 0x9300
STRING: 「The entire ecosystem will be destroyed.」

LABEL: 0x9387
STRING: 「――Just like here in this sea.」

LABEL: 0x93B0
STRING: Yukari was not joking around.

LABEL: 0x93F0
STRING: Even if I couldn't understand it, I had no choice but to believe her.

LABEL: 0x942C
STRING: Even if I couldn't believe it, it had to be the truth.

LABEL: 0x94DA
STRING: 「Do you understand now?」

LABEL: 0x9513
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x952D
STRING: 「But <COOS> is a bacteria, right?」

LABEL: 0x956B
STRING: 「What about diagnostic agents? Have you examined it under a microscope?」

LABEL: 0x95AB
STRING: 「Besides, how do you even know if you're infected with it...?」

LABEL: 0x95FA
STRING: 「Whether or not you're infected with <COOS>――」

LABEL: 0x9630
STRING: 「You can tell simply by the presence or absence of the luminescence.」

LABEL: 0x9662
STRING: 「<COOS> begins to multiply in the host's body and migrates to its surface within hours after infection...」

LABEL: 0x9715
STRING: 「Once that light is seen, there's no hope for survival.」

LABEL: 0x975E
STRING: ――So that's why she made Hiragino sleep in this dark room.

LABEL: 0x97A2
STRING: So she could tell right away if he emitted light.

LABEL: 0x983E
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei...」

LABEL: 0x985C
STRING: 「You haven't shown any signs of infection yet.」

LABEL: 0x989A
STRING: 「But, just because you're not glowing doesn't mean you're not infected with <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x9907
STRING: The incubation period was a few hours...

LABEL: 0x9929
STRING: With such a vague time window, it was hard to tell if Hiragino was infected or not.

LABEL: 0x9998
STRING: 「As long as there's the possibility of an infection...」

LABEL: 0x99CE
STRING: 「We have to avoid making contact with you two.」

LABEL: 0x9A31
STRING: Yukari pointed her speargun at us.

LABEL: 0x9A67
STRING: It wasn't that she was aiming at us, but she was simply showing the distance between us and them.

LABEL: 0x9AC3
STRING: There were two meters between me and Tokiwa, who were still at the emergency room's entrance, and Yukari and Hiragino, who were arguing inside.

LABEL: 0x9C0F
STRING: 「You understand, don't you, Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0x9C41
STRING: 「What you... no.」

LABEL: 0x9C65
STRING: 「What we should do.」

LABEL: 0x9C92
STRING: There were Yukari and Hiragino, who were most likely infected,

LABEL: 0x9CCC
STRING: and me and Tokiwa, who were not.

LABEL: 0x9D02
STRING: Yukari insisted that we should stay away from each other.

LABEL: 0x9DB6
STRING: 「...Very well.」

LABEL: 0x9DD6
STRING: 「I'll keep my distance for now.」

LABEL: 0x9E19
STRING: He readily obeyed Yukari.

LABEL: 0x9E41
STRING: However, the look in his eyes was as sharp as ever.

LABEL: 0x9EDF
STRING: 「But as a doctor, I want to find a way for us to survive.」

LABEL: 0x9F1D
STRING: 「If there's a way to avoid dying from this infection――」

LABEL: 0x9F80
STRING: 「It's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x9F9A
STRING: 「It's a bacteria that ROMLES has spent the last seven years trying to find a way to deal with.」

LABEL: 0x9FF5
STRING: 「So... what do you think

LABEL: 0xA072
STRING: you can do by yourself?!」

LABEL: 0xA108
STRING: 「That doesn't mean we should just abandon hope and do nothing!」

LABEL: 0xA17C
STRING: 「That girl!!」

LABEL: 0xA19F
STRING: I heard a noise.

LABEL: 0xA1B9
STRING: A muffled sound came from the door installed in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xA1FD
STRING: The one that led to the pressurization room, and beyond it――

LABEL: 0xA23E
STRING: 「It came from the rescue ship...」

LABEL: 0xA263
STRING: ...Ah, I see.

LABEL: 0xA283
STRING: The girl Hiragino was trying to protect from Yukari――

LABEL: 0xA2C5
STRING: ――I assumed he had been talking about Touri.

LABEL: 0xA2F3
STRING: I had made another big mistake.

LABEL: 0xA3FD
STRING: 「――What reason is there to shoot a dead man?」

LABEL: 0xA458
STRING: That man's corpse had been shot with an arrow.

LABEL: 0xA47C
STRING: Indeed, there was no reason to try to kill someone who was already dead.

LABEL: 0xA539
STRING: However, the premise was wrong from the start.

LABEL: 0xA569
STRING: The man had been possessed by the light... by <COOS>, and had collapsed...

LABEL: 0xA59F
STRING: But, it was just as Touri had said.

LABEL: 0xA5D1
STRING: All we had seen... was him falling, engulfed in light.

LABEL: 0xA68D
STRING: We hadn't confirmed anyone's death.

LABEL: 0xA6CB
STRING: We couldn't get close to him in the first place, so... we had no way of checking.

LABEL: 0xA76C
STRING: 「He was alive...」

LABEL: 0xA792
STRING: Even after being infected by <COOS>, he was not dead.

LABEL: 0xA7CA
STRING: ...No, maybe he wasn't the only one.

LABEL: 0xA804
STRING: Why had Yukari come to this room in the first place?

LABEL: 0xA83C
STRING: ――Wasn't it because she had witnessed a person being alive after being attacked by that luminous creature?

LABEL: 0xA894
STRING: Yes...

LABEL: 0xA8B0
STRING: Yukari had found him moving around despite being infected by the light,

LABEL: 0xA8EE
STRING: and had fired an arrow and put an end to his hopeless life.

LABEL: 0xA930
STRING: At the same time, Yukari realized another possibility.

LABEL: 0xA960
STRING: She had realized...

LABEL: 0xA980
STRING: Just as Touri had forcefully insisted...

LABEL: 0xA9A6
STRING: ...The possibility that "she" was still alive.

LABEL: 0xA9D8
STRING: ――At that time.

LABEL: 0xAA66
STRING: The door to the pressurization room opened.

LABEL: 0xAA88
STRING: Slowly, as if in slow motion...

LABEL: 0xAABC
STRING: The door opened.

LABEL: 0xAAD2
STRING: Pandora's box.

LABEL: 0xAAEE
STRING: On the other side...

LABEL: 0xAB0C
STRING: ――A girl was standing there, her whole body bathed in light.
